Texts.Eng:
Article 9, Paragraph 3.
-Outcasts.

Outcasts are not allowed to enter Skath Territory anymore and only greatly honourable acts will allow them to enter Skath inhabited star systems again. To regain his honour, an outcasts needs to prove his honourable actions first. If his act is honourable enough he shall regain his Skath citizenship and is freely allowed to live around his kind again. If not, he has to leave the entered system within one Galactic Standard Day.
